moves.commentary: Rook to g six check. Double rook sacrifice begins.
moves.speaker: S1

moves.commentary: Pawn takes on g six. Both rooks are gone.
moves.speaker: S1

moves.commentary: Queen to a one. Quiet retreat lining up the diagonal.
moves.speaker: S1

moves.commentary: King takes the f seven rook.
moves.speaker: S1

moves.commentary: Queen to f six check. Driving the king back.
moves.speaker: S1

moves.commentary: Bishop to a six. Shuts down counterplay.
moves.speaker: S1

moves.commentary: Black plays rook e eight to guard g seven.
moves.speaker: S1

moves.commentary: Queen to g seven mate. Queen protected by bishop a six.
moves.speaker: S1
